hero.title:
Build a 2D game
with blocks, code, and AI
hero.subtitle: EgotGames is an AI-assisted 2D game studio in your browser—prototype with Blockly or p5.js, preview instantly, and share a playable link.

step1.title: 1. Describe your idea
step1.desc: Choose Blockly or JavaScript, then tell us what you want to build.

step2.title: 2. Build and iterate
step2.desc: Use the editor + AI assistant to add mechanics, polish visuals, and keep your loop fun.

step3.title: 3. Publish and share
step3.desc: Make it public or private, then share a link anyone can play in the browser.

whyEgot.title: Why EgotGames
whyEgot.subtitle: Build real games, not demos. EgotGames gives you the tools to go from idea → playable loop → shareable link with a workflow designed for fast iteration.

twoModes.title: Two creation modes
twoModes.desc: Visual blocks (Blockly) for beginners, or p5.js JavaScript for advanced creators.

aiAssistant.title: AI that edits your project
aiAssistant.desc: Ask for changes in plain language; the assistant updates your blocks/code while keeping existing features.

instantPreview.title: Instant preview
instantPreview.desc: Play your game as you build, with a browser-ready runtime.

publishShare.title: Publish + share
publishShare.desc: Toggle between draft/published and private/public—then share with friends or the community.

assets.title: Assets & pixel art
assets.desc: Upload sprites/sounds, or generate pixel art with AI and save it to your library.

premium.title: Premium membership
premium.desc: Download your games, unlock 3D creation with three.js, and get 50 free AI credits every month.

beginners.title: For beginners
beginners.desc: Learn by building: start with Blockly blocks, see what each step does, and grow into real game logic.

creators.title: For creators
creators.desc: Move fast with p5.js: prototype gameplay loops, tune controls and feel, and iterate with an AI partner that can edit code.

teams.title: For teams & classrooms
teams.desc: Share a link, review quickly, and keep projects organized with cloud saves and simple publishing controls.

coding.q: Do I need to know how to code?
coding.a: No. Start in Blockly and build game logic visually. If you want more control later, you can move to JavaScript mode.

gameTypes.q: What kind of games can I make?
gameTypes.a: 2D browser games built on p5.js—arcade, endless runners, puzzles, and more—designed for fast prototyping and iteration.

sharing.a: Yes. Publish it and choose public/private visibility, then share a playable link.

assets.q: Can I bring my own assets?
assets.a: Yes. Upload assets to your library, and also generate pixel art assets with the Pixel Editor.

premium.q: What do I get with Premium ($5/mo)?
premium.a: Download your games, unlock 3D game support (three.js), and receive 50 free AI credits every month.
